making this game free to play was the best decision you guys ever made.NOT!

I entered a competitive match, got two teammates who were absolute silvers, one of whom had over 4k hours. They both had 2 kills by the end of the first half. How can somebody possibly be so bad in DMG with so many hours is beyond me. Anyways, we kicked one of them and the other one disconnected. We couldn't surrender because one of them hadn't "AbaNdoNed thE MatCh" 5 minutes after disconnecting and the counter still said one minute (they're supposed to automatically abandon after 3 minutes!). We finally got to surrender and we try to join a new game and guess what,  CS:GO tells us we have an ongoing match to which we cannot reconnect (because we surrendered) so we have to abandon it, which of course gets us all a nice temporary cooldown. Thanks Valve.
